title: Two-Sided Movement from New York International
medium: Double-sided screenprint and sheet with cut-outs from a portfolio of seven screenprints, two lithographs, and one offset lithograph with objects in various media
dimensions: composition (.a, recto, irreg.): 9 13/16 × 18 1/2" (24.9 × 47 cm); composition (.a, verso, irreg.): 7 15/16 × 18 7/8" (20.2 × 48 cm); sheet (.a & .b, each approx.): 16 15/16 x 21 15/16" (43.1 x 55.8 cm)
